author: Shrimad BhagwadGeeta
quote: If you want to see yours advanced avatar then choose that level of battlefield.

author: Shrimad BhagwadGeeta
quote: If you ever feel tired and unsupported then just remember about Shri Krishna.

author: Shrimad BhagwadGeeta
quote: If you are fighting for a good means then don't see that who is opposing you, just fight against them.

author: Shrimad BhagwadGeeta
quote: Do your duty without attachment to results.

author: Bhagwat Purana
quote: Purity, Patience and Preservance are the essentials to success.

author: Quran
quote: There is no compulsion in religion.

author: Bible
quote: Blessed are the piecemakers.

author: Upanishads
quote: Control of the mind is the root of all wisdom.

author: Quran
quote: Indeed, with hardship comes in ease.

author: Dhammapada
quote: Speak the truth. Do not yield to anger.

author: Quran
quote: Indeed, Allah is with those who are patient.

author: Quran
quote: And whoever puts his trust in Allah then he will suffice him.

author: Shrimad BhagwadGeeta
quote: One who sees all beings as equal has truly understood.

author: Shrimad BhagwadGeeta
quote: Ahimsa parmo dharma dharmaiw himsa tathaiwa cha.

author: Quran (2:286)
quote: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

author: Quran (94:6)
quote: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

author: Quran (5:32)
quote: Whoever saves one life, it is as if he had saved mankind entirely.

author: Quran (13:11)
quote: Indeed, Allah will not change the condition of a people until they change what is in themselves.

author: Quran (2:2)
quote: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah.

author: Quran (3:139)
quote: Do not lose hope, nor be sad. You will surely be victorious if you are true believers.

author: Quran (24:35)
quote: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth.

author: Quran (31:17)
quote: Establish prayer, enjoin what is right, forbid what is wrong, and be patient over what befalls you.

author: Quran (49:13)
quote: The most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you.

author: Quran (93:5)
quote: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.

author: Bhagavad Gita (2:47)
quote: You have a right to perform your prescribed duties, but you are not entitled to the fruits of your actions.

author: Bhagavad Gita (4:7)
quote: Whenever there is a decline in righteousness, I incarnate myself.

author: Bhagavad Gita (2:20)
quote: The soul is neither born, and nor does it die.

author: Bhagavad Gita (3:19)
quote: One should perform duties without attachment for by doing so one attains the Supreme.

author: Bhagavad Gita (6:5)
quote: Elevate yourself through your own efforts, and do not degrade yourself.

author: Bhagavad Gita (5:29)
quote: Peace comes to them who know me as the ultimate purpose of all sacrifices and austerities.

author: Bhagavad Gita (2:13)
quote: Just as boyhood, youth and old age come to the embodied soul, in the same manner, is the attaining of another body.

author: Bhagavad Gita (10:20)
quote: I am the Self, O Gudakesha, seated in the hearts of all creatures.

author: Bhagavad Gita (18:66)
quote: Abandon all varieties of religion and just surrender unto me. I shall deliver you from all sinful reactions.

author: Bhagavad Gita (16:24)
quote: The injunctions of the scriptures are your only guide.

author: Bible (Philippians 4:13)
quote: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.

author: Bible (Jeremiah 29:11)
quote: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you.

author: Bible (Proverbs 3:5)
quote: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.

author: Bible (Psalm 23:1)
quote: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.

author: Bible (Romans 8:28)
quote: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him.

author: Bible (Isaiah 40:31)
quote: But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles.

author: Bible (Matthew 7:7)
quote: Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find.

author: Bible (1 Corinthians 13:4)
quote: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.

author: Bible (John 8:32)
quote: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

author: Bible (Genesis 1:1)
quote: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.
